programme.desc: The plains of Africa are home to nature's most fearsome predators - Cheetahs, Lions, Hyenas. But the battle for survival is never one sided, even the prey animals are formidable. We see a mother cheetah come face to face with the heavy weaponry of a Grants Gazelle, and unpack what happens when three male lions make the mistake of their lives, and try to take down a pugnacious Rhino..

programme.title: Snakes In The City
programme.desc: In this episode, the calls are coming in thick and fast. A giant lizard enters a garden and gets into a fight with a dog. By the time Simon and Siouxise get there, the battle is lost for this monitor lizard, and it has suffered severe injuries. Simon and Siouxsie are in the business of saving the lives of animals, no exceptions. .

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: On the African Plains, the American Highlands, and the Desert Badlands, Animal Fight Night exposes nature, red in tooth and claw. Lions go head to head, a Grey Wolf pack takes on a Grizzly, Hippos hammer out a violent battle, and one of the world's largest monkeys plans a mission to murder. Lust, Jealousy, and Pure Rage fuel deadly encounters in the wild, as the natural world shows its savage side.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Everything feels connected as the vets see patterns emerge in their cases. Treating back-to-back Australian Shepherds, waves of animals suffering respiratory ailments, and a rush of lumps and bumps keeps the team hustling. Although the symptoms, breeds, and names can feel alike, no two cases are really the same. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Armed with a bucket and tube, Dr. Pol works tirelessly to help a horse struggling with choke. Inside the clinic, Dr. Lisa tackles the many maladies of Mushi the cat, and Dr. Brenda treats a fussy feline. Something odd happens when Doc meets another DocDr. Strange the steer. Charles is worried about his dog Athena and looks to his dad for guidance. .

programme.title: Snakes In The City
programme.desc: In this episode, Simon and Sousxie travel from one side of the city to the other responding to the cries for help as snakes wonder into the wrong places. From multi millionaires to low income rural areas, the snakes are everywhere. Simon and Siouxsie take risks everyday as they come face to face with some of the world's most dangerous snakes..

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: On the African Plains, the American Highlands, and the Desert Badlands, Animal Fight Night exposes nature, red in tooth and claw. Lions go head to head, a Grey Wolf pack takes on a Grizzly, Hippos hammer out a violent battle, and one of the world's largest monkeys plans a mission to murder. Lust, Jealousy, and Pure Rage fuel deadly encounters in the wild, as the natural world shows its savage side.

programme.title: Snakes In The City
programme.desc: In this episode, Siouxsie's job is to watch Simon's back to keep him alive, but it's an emotional roller coaster for Siouxsie. They've just arrived at a suburban home, Simon spots a forest cobra in the garden, but it flees. The phone rings again and the dreaded words of the caller are clear: black mamba!.

programme.title: Snakes In The City
programme.desc: A massive 2.5 metre black mamba is holding an apartment block hostage. Meanwhile Sioux uncovers another one at a wedding venue, and this time she must catch it alone. It‚Äôs a case of mistaken identity, when the crew get called to another big grey snake, that turns out to be a turtle! Mbali has a close brush with death as she releases her first Black mamba. .

programme.title: Snakes In The City
programme.desc: Mbali completes her training by capturing an enormous black mamba inside a garden shed and Simon and Sioux head off to India for a brand-new snake adventure. It‚Äôs monsoon season in the city of Mysore and local snake catcher, Snake Shyam, needs help. A keelback finds itself trapped inside a water tank, a huge rat snake gets stuck in a motorbike and a deadly cobra terrorizes workers in a warehouse.
